channel.title: me on Pablo Palazon's Website
channel.description: Recent content in me on Pablo Palazon's Website

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Pablo Palazon, and I’m an human being living on Earth. This is my personal website. Why do I write on my own website?. I’d like to write several articles and essays in English to improve my skills. I like STEM affairs such as space, technology, physics and computer science. I’m not an expert or guru on STEM, but it’s a good idea to write about something that you want to learn.
